message.entry: X-data must be the same size as Y-data.
Arguments must be vectors of the same length, matrices of the same size, or a combination of vectors and matrices that share a matching size in one dimension.
Invalid number of data arguments. You must specify 2, 3, 4, or 6 data arguments.
The orientation flag can only be used for 2, 3, or 4 data arguments.
Error arguments must be empty when the data are categorical.
Error arguments must be a duration vector when the data are datetime or duration.
Error arguments must be a numeric vector when the data are numeric.
{0} must be empty or the same size as YData.
{0} must be empty when the data are categorical.
{0} must be a numeric or duration vector.
{0} must be a duration vector when the data are datetime or duration.
{0} must be a numeric vector when the data are numeric.
